Hit Effects: An enemy adjacent to you takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Description: You hit one enemy% then cleave into another.

Miss Effects: Half Strength modifier damage. If you’re wielding a two-handed weapon%  you deal damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Description: You punctuate your scything attacks with wicked jabs and small cutting blows that slip through your enemy’s defenses.
You trade power for precision.

Hit Effects: You push the target 1 square if it is your size% smaller than you% or one size category larger. You can shift into the space that the target occupied.
Description: After each mighty swing% you bring your shield to bear and use it to push your enemy back.

Hit Effects: An ally adjacent to the target can shift 2 squares.
Description: You launch a dizzying barrage of thrusts at your enemy% compelling him to give you all his attention. Under the cover of your ferocious attack% one of your allies can safely retreat from that same foe.

Secondary Target: One creature other than the primary target
Hit Effects: You can shift 1 square. Make a secondary attack.
Description: You strike at one foe and allow momentum to carry you forward into a second strike against a second foe.
You spin beneath your enemy’s guard with a long% powerful cut% and then sweep your leg through his an instant later to knock him head over heels.

Hit Effects: The target is slowed and cannot shift until end of your next turn.
Description: You stab viciously at your foe’s knee or foot to slow him down. No matter how tough he is% he’s going to favor that leg for a time.
You shatter armor and bone with a ringing blow

Hit Effects: You can spend a healing surge.
Description: A timely strike against a hated foe invigorates you% giving you the strength and resolve to fight on.

Hit Effects: You gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and a +4 power bonus to damage rolls against the target until the end of the encounter.
Miss Effects: Gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and a +2 power bonus to damage rolls against the target until the end of the encounter.
Description: You strike your enemy hard and hound him with skilled parries and stern reprisals.

Effects: You gain regeneration 2 + your Constitution modifier when you are bloodied.
Description: You shake off the worst of your wounds.

Effects: You slide the target 2 squares to a square that is adjacent to you.
Description: You pull one of your allies into a more advantageous position.

Trigger: An enemy attacks you and has combat advantage against you
Effects: Cancel the combat advantage you were about to grant to the attack.
Description: You raise your weapon or shield to block an opening in your defenses.

Effects: You gain temporary hit points equal to 2d6 + your Constitution modifier.
Description: You let your adrenaline surge carry you through the battle.

Weapon Bonus: If you’re wielding a light blade or a spear% you gain a bonus to the attack and damage roll equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Description: You drive your weapon through a weak point in your foe’s defenses.

Weapon Bonus: If you’re wielding an axe% a hammer% or a mace% you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Constitution modifier.
Description: You wind up and deliver a devastating blow with your weapon.

Weapon Bonus: If you’re wielding a polearm or a heavy blade% the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Description: Weaving your weapon in a graceful figure-eight% you lash out with a sudden attack.
You trade damage for accuracy when you really want to land an attack on your opponent.

Weapon Bonus: If you’re wielding a light blade% a spear% or a flail and have Dexterity 15 or higher% make a secondary attack.
Secondary Target: The same or a different target
Description: You become a blur of motion% raining a series of blows upon your opponent.

Weapon Bonus: If you’re wielding an axe% a flail% a heavy blade% or a pick% you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Strength modifier.
Primary Target: Each enemy in burst you can see
Description: You put all your strength into a single mighty swing that strikes many enemies at once.

Hit Effects: The target takes ongoing 5 damage and a –2 penalty to AC (save ends both).
Description: You break through your enemy’s armor and deal a painful bleeding wound.
You crack your foe upside the head.

Effects: Any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you takes 1[W] damage% as long as you are able to make opportunity attacks.
Description: You constantly swing your weapon about% slashing and cutting into nearby enemies.

Effects: Gain a +2 power bonus to your Fortitude% Reflex% or Will defense.
Description: With a soldier’s discipline% you fend off attacks that would overcome a lesser person.

Trigger: You are hit by an attack
Effects: Reduce the damage from the attack by 5 + your Constitution modifier.
Description: You steel yourself against a brutal attack.

Primary Target: Each enemy in burst you can see
Effects: Each target must shift 2 and end adjacent to you% if possible. A target that can’t end adjacent to you doesn’t move. You can then attack any targets that are adjacent to you (close burst 1).
Description: You call your opponents toward you and deliver a blow they will never forget.

Hit Effects: The target takes a –2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.
Description: You rain several heavy overhand blows down on your foe. They force him to raise his guard high to meet your attack% exposing a vulnerable spot for your next attack—the underarm% side% or belly.

Effects: You gain a +1 power bonus to AC (or a +2 bonus if you’re using a shield) until the end of your next turn.
Description: You use your weapon or shield to parry one blow after another% denying your foes the satisfaction of getting in a solid hit against you.
You trade precision for power.

Effects: Move a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier (minimum 1).
Description: You throw your weight into a strike% using the momentum of the swing to surge forward.

Primary Target: Each enemy in burst you can see
Description: With supreme skill and great resolve% you beat your enemies back.

Primary Target: Each enemy in burst you can see
Description: You sting and hinder nearby foes with a savage flurry of strikes aimed at their legs.

Hit Effects: You regain hit points as if you had spent a healing surge.
Description: You strike true% and your enemy’s howl of pain is like music to your ears% making you forget about your own wounds.

Effects: You can move 3 squares% as long as you can end your move adjacent to an enemy.
Description: You unleash a fierce battle cry as you leap boldly into the fray.

Trigger: You are hit by an attack
Effects: You take no damage from the attack that just hit you. However% you are stunned and take a –2 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
Description: Thanks to a combination of skill and luck% you narrowly avoid an attack but leave yourself perilously exposed.

Effects: The targets gain a +1 shield bonus to AC until the end of the encounter. If you are using a shield% increase the bonus to +2 and apply it to your allies’ Reflex defense as well.
Description: Your thoughts turn to defense as you begin using your weapon or shield to protect nearby allies.

Weapon Bonus: If you’re wielding a hammer or a mace% the target is stunned rather than dazed.
Hit Effects: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Description: Your weapon makes a satisfying clunk as it connects with your enemy’s skull.

Weapon Bonus: If you’re wielding an axe% you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Constitution modifier for both the primary and secondary attack.
Secondary Target: Each enemy adjacent to the primary target and within your melee reach
Description: You lay about with heavy% sweeping blows% hewing your enemies left and right.

Weapon Bonus: If you’re wielding a spear or a polearm% on hit% you push the target a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier. You also can shift a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Description: You trip your enemies% knocking them back. As they recover% you shift to a more advantageous position.

Weapon Bonus: If you’re wielding a heavy blade or a light blade% you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Effects: After the attack% you can shift 1 square and repeat the attack against another target within reach. You can then shift 1 square and repeat the attack against a third target within reach. After the final attack% you can shift 1 square.
Description: You duck and weave between your enemies while slashing at them ferociously.

Weapon Bonus: If you’re wielding a pick or a spear% the target also cannot shift until the end of your next turn.
Hit Effects: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Description: Like the deadly talon of a great raptor% your steel pierces your foe and pins him in place.

Secondary Target: The same or a different target
Effects: Perform two attacks against one target or one attack against each target
Description: You strike twice in rapid succession.

Hit Effects: The target is knocked prone if it is your size or smaller.
Effects: After the attack% you can shift 1 square and repeat the attack against another target within reach. You can shift and repeat the attack up to three times against different targets.
Description: You weave through the battlefield% striking like a hungry serpent and sweeping the feet out from under your enemies.

Effects: You gain regeneration equal to your Constitution modifier% a +1 power bonus to AC% and a +1 power bonus to saving throws. Any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you takes 1[W] damage and is slowed until the end of its turn% as long as you are able to make opportunity attacks.
Description: You twirl your weapon about and test the defenses of nearby foes while expertly parrying their blows.

Trigger: An adjacent ally is hit by an attack
Effects: The ally gains a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex defense against the triggering attack. If you are using a shield% increase the bonus to +4.
Description: Using your weapon or shield% you block an attack made against a close ally.

Effects: You spend a healing surge% regain additional hit points equal to 2d6 + your Constitution modifier% and make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end.
Description: Like a tankard of bad ale% you don’t go down easy.

Trigger: An adjacent enemy moves away from you
Effects: Shift into the square that the enemy vacated. You have combat advantage against that enemy until the end of your next turn.
Description: You dog your enemy’s footsteps% refusing to yield.
You trade damage for accuracy to land a much-needed hit on your opponent.

Hit Effects: The target drops one weapon it is holding. You can choose to catch the dropped weapon in a free hand or have it land on the ground at your feet (in your square).
Description: You chop at your foe’s hand% causing a grievous injury and forcing him to drop his weapon.

Effects: After the attack% you can move a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier and make a melee basic attack after your move.
Description: You frustrate your enemy% landing a calculated blow and then moving away before he can retaliate.

Effects: After the attack% you can shift the same distance you pushed the target. You must end your move adjacent to the target.
Description: You land a ringing blow% then push your enemy back without giving other nearby enemies the opportunity to strike you.

Primary Target: Each enemy in burst you can see
Hit Effects: You push the target 1 square% and it is knocked prone.
Description: You become a whirling cyclone of death% spinning your weapon about as you strike one foe after another% pushing them back and knocking them down.

Special Effects: All of your enemies within 2 squares of the target are marked until the end of your next turn.
Description: You land a mighty blow that causes your foe to stagger backward. With a wicked grin% you hoist your weapon and flash it menacingly at other enemies nearby.

Primary Target: Each enemy in burst you can see
Secondary Target: Any enemy that moves adjacent to you or starts its turn adjacent to you
Effects: Until the start of your next turn% adjacent enemies are subject to a secondary attack.
Description: You thrash your foes with a devastating array of strikes% and then unleash your fury a second time against anyone left standing.
You swing your weapon in a terrific arc% hitting with such force that your foe stumbles backward.

Effects: Until the end of the encounter% you can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action if you are adjacent to it and it either shifts or attacks one of your allies.
Description: After landing a tremendous blow% you dog your enemy and make him think twice about turning his back on you.

Requirement: An ally within 10 squares is dying.
Effects: You gain an action point that you must spend during your current turn.
Description: The sight of one of your friends dying propels you into sudden action.

Trigger: Your hit points drop to 0 or lower
Effects: You regain enough hit points to bring you to one-half your maximum hit points. However% you take a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of the encounter.
Description: You refuse to go down% turning a death blow into one last chance for victory.

Weapon Bonus: If you’re wielding a flail and are adjacent to the target at the end of your turn% the target is restrained until the start of your next turn.
Description: After landing a decisive blow% you skillfully use your weapon to entangle and restrain your opponent.

Weapon Bonus: If you’re wielding a light blade or a heavy blade% you gain a bonus to both damage rolls equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Secondary Target: One creature adjacent to the primary target and within your melee reach
Description: You lunge forward and draw blood from one enemy% then spin around and strike another foe with deadly ferocity.

Weapon Bonus: If you’re wielding an axe% you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Constitution modifier.
Description: You swing your weapon in deadly arcs% mercilessly hacking and slashing at your foe’s armor until finally you break through.

Weapon Bonus: If you’re wielding a pick% a polearm% or a spear% you can score a critical hit on a roll of 18–20.
Hit Effects: The target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Description: With a sharp thrust of your weapon% you leave your enemy nearly paralyzed with pain.

Weapon Bonus: If you’re wielding a hammer or a mace% you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Constitution modifier% and your enemy is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Hit Effects: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Description: You bring your weapon down upon your enemy’s skull with a loud crack that leaves him dazed and reeling.

Primary Target: Each enemy in burst you can see
Effects: Each target must shift 3 and end adjacent to you% if possible. A target that can’t end adjacent to you doesn’t move. You can then attack any targets that are adjacent to you (close burst 1).
Description: You call your opponents toward you and strike out with lashing blows.

Effects: Whenever you use a fighter power% you can score a critical hit on a roll of 19–20% and you gain a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Dexterity modifier. Any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you takes 1[W] damage and ongoing 10 damage (save ends)% as long as you are able to make opportunity attacks.
Description: Every enemy within your reach falls victim to the ruthless precision of your attacks and suffers bleeding wounds.

Hit Effects: All of your enemies you can see are marked until the end of your next turn.
Description: After smashing your weapon into a foe with amazing force% you cast your baleful glare upon the enemies that still stand before you.

Hit Effects: Until the end of your next turn the only attacks the target can make are basic attacks.
Description: Your weapon blurs as you attack your foe a dozen times in the blink of an eye. You have an answer for every parry and every counterattack. Under your incredible assault% your enemy can do little more than defend itself.

Hit Effects: The target takes a –2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.
Description: Your weapon breaks through shields and armor like they’re made of parchment.

Primary Target: Each enemy in burst you can see
Secondary Target: Each enemy in burst you can see
Effects: You can shift 2 squares% and then make a secondary attack.
Description: You spin your weapon about% carving into adjacent foes and causing them to scream in agony. Without warning% you slip through their blockade and make another spinning sweep.

Hit Effects: You take half damage from the target’s attacks until the end of your next turn.
Effects: You gain a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.
Description: Your shield becomes your staunchest ally.

Effects: All of your enemies within 10 squares of you are marked until the end of your next turn.
Description: You will not be denied your enemy’s blood% and other foes that witness your savage attack know the ill fate that awaits them.

Effects: You deal an extra 1[W] damage with your at-will and encounter fighter powers. If an enemy starts its turn adjacent to you% you can use an at-will fighter power against it as a free action at the start of its turn% as long as you are able to make opportunity attacks.
Description: With the slightest flick of your weapon and minimal movement% you control the battle and turn your enemies’ thoughts from conquest to survival.
Let nothing stand between a warrior and the object of his wrath.
You knock aside your enemies’ weapons% creating holes in their defenses that enable you to strike deadly blows against two of them at once.

Hit Effects: You push the target 1 square. You can shift into the square formerly occupied by the target. If you do so% each ally within 2 squares of you can shift 1 square as well.
Description: You beat back your enemy% allowing you and your allies to seize new ground.

Effects: Shift into any adjacent square. If a creature occupies the square into which you shift% you push that creature 1 square.
Description: You throw yourself at your enemy and knock him back.

Hit Effects: You push the target 1 square and it is knocked prone. In addition% the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Effects: You can spend a healing surge
Description: A mighty blow sends your opponent flying through the air and gives you a few seconds to regain your composure.
An unerring strike foretells your enemy’s demise.

Trigger: You take damage from an attack
Effects: Reduce the damage by an amount equal to your level.
Description: With a whirl of your weapon% you expertly deflect an enemy’s attack.

Secondary Target: One creature other than the primary target
Secondary Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage% and the target is knocked prone and immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Tertiary Target: One creature other than the primary and secondary targets
Tertiary Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage% and the target is knocked prone and immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Hit Effects: The target is knocked prone and immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Effects: After both the primary and secondary attacks% you can shift 5 squares and make a secondary and tertiary attack respectively.
Description: You leap from one foe to the next% striking with ever-increasing accuracy while negotiating your way through your enemies’ thicket of swords.

Secondary Hit: 1d6 + Strength modifier damage% and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Hit Effects: Make a secondary attack against the same target.
Description: After landing a solid blow% you belt your enemy in the face with your fist.

Trigger: You take damage from a melee attack
Effects: Until the end of your next turn% you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls against the enemy that damaged you.
Description: You react viciously to an enemy that just hurt you.

Secondary Target: Each enemy within 5 squares of you
Secondary Hit: The target moves its speed away from you
Hit Effects: If the target was bloodied before the attack% it takes +2[W] damage.
Effects: If you reduce the target to 0 hit points or fewer% you can make a secondary attack.
Description: You skewer yet another unworthy foe and let loose a terrifying roar of triumph when he falls.

Special Effects: This power can be used as an opportunity attack.
Description: You slip your blade past your enemy’s armor and slice him just so% leaving a bleeding gash.

Requirement: You make a successful melee attack with a light blade or heavy blade (not a polearm)
Primary Target: One enemy other than the one you just hit
Effects: The target is marked until the end of your next turn.
Description: With perfect timing% you flick one enemy’s blood into the eyes of another.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade or a heavy blade (not a polearm).
Primary Target: Each enemy in burst you can see
Effects: If you hit at least one of your enemies% you regain one daily power you have already used. If you miss all enemies% you regain one encounter power you have already used.
Description: With a tremendous roar% you swing your blade over your head and make lunging strikes at all nearby enemies. At the end of the flurry% you regain some of your power.
